concept.cypher: MATCH (package:Package)<-[:MEMBER_OF]- (cu:CompilationUnit)-[:HAS_TYPE_DECLARATION]-> ()-[:HAS_CLASS_DECLARATION]-> ()-[:HAS_NORMAL_CLASS_DECLARATION]-> (ncd:NormalClassDeclaration)-[:HAS_IDENTIFIER]-> (identifier:TerminalNodeStrings) MERGE (type:Java:Language:Type { name: identifier.text, fqn: package.fqn + '.' + identifier.text }) SET //Class label is added separately so that a resolved type:Java:Language:Type can be referenced type:Class MERGE (type)-[:DEFINED_BY]->(ncd) MERGE (type)-[:MEMBER_OF]->(package) RETURN *

MATCH (package:Package)<-[:MEMBER_OF]- (cu:CompilationUnit)-[:HAS_TYPE_DECLARATION]-> ()-[:HAS_CLASS_DECLARATION]-> ()-[:HAS_ENUM_DECLARATION]-> (enum:EnumDeclaration)-[:HAS_IDENTIFIER]-> (identifier:TerminalNodeStrings) MERGE (type:Java:Language:Type { name: identifier.text, fqn: package.fqn + '.' + identifier.text }) SET //Enum label is added separately so that a resolved type:Java:Language:Type can be referenced type:Enum MERGE (type)-[x:DEFINED_BY]->(enum) MERGE (type)-[y:MEMBER_OF]->(package) RETURN *

MATCH (type:Java:Language:Type:Class)-[:DEFINED_BY]-> ()-[:HAS_SUPERCLASS]-> ()-[:HAS_CLASS_TYPE]-> (classType)-[:HAS_IDENTIFIER]->(identifier:TerminalNodeStrings) MERGE (superClass:Java:Language:Type:Class { name: identifier.text }) MERGE (type)-[x:EXTENDS]->(superClass) MERGE (type)-[:DEFINED_BY]->(classType) RETURN *

MATCH (type:Java:Language:Type)-[:DEFINED_BY]-> ()-[:HAS_SUPERINTERFACES]-> ()-[:HAS_INTERFACE_TYPE_LIST]-> ()-[:HAS_INTERFACE_TYPE]-> (interfaceType)-[:HAS_CLASS_TYPE]-> (classType)-[:HAS_IDENTIFIER]->(identifier:TerminalNodeStrings) MERGE (interface:Java:Language:Type:Interface { name: identifier.text }) MERGE (type)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(interface) MERGE (interface)-[:DEFINED_BY]->(interfaceType) RETURN *
